thread.title: CSX Still Winning Back Business After Service Disruptions

author: Paul Ziobro
title: CSX Still Winning Back Business After Service Disruptions
text:
CSX Corp. still has work to do to win back shippers following last yearâ€™s service disruptions that occurred after a massive overhaul of the railroad network under its prior chief executive.
James Foote, who took over as CEO last month after the death of the railroad turnaround specialist Hunter Harrison, said CSX is starting to win back some of that business but still has to prove to some shippers that its railroad network is more reliable.
...
